Package user

Interface UserDAO<User>

Type Parameters:
User - a generic Type of User
All Known Implementing Classes:
AdminDAOImp, DoctorDAOImp, PatientDAOImp
public interface UserDAO<User>
This interface specifies the abstract methods that the DAO Implementations of the Subclasses of User must implement

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    delete​(User user)
    This is a method that receives an user object It searches for ID of the given user and deletes the object inside the database.
    void
    deleteByID​(long id)
    This is a method that receives the ID of an Admin It searches for the Admin with the given ID and deletes the object inside the database.

    This is a method that receives an admin object The validity of password and email is checked first The method allows us edit the user properties

    This is a method that recieves an user and allows the admin to edit the user

    This is a method that receives an User object and saves its properties into the database after checking the validity of the password and email.

  • Method Details

    • save

      boolean save​(User user) throws PasswordException, EmailException
      This is a method that receives an User object and saves its properties into the database after checking the validity of the password and email.
      Parameters:
      user - of the type User
      Returns:
      success of saving
      Throws:
      PasswordException - password error
      EmailException - email error

    • edit

      Parameters:

      Throws:
      PasswordException - password error
      EmailException - email error
